articles.title: Gaia Spacecraft Discovers Parts of the Milky Way Are Much Older Than Thought - SciTechDaily

articles.content: This surprising result comes from an analysis performed by Maosheng Xiang and Hans-Walter Rix, from the Max-Planck Institute for Astronomy, Heidelberg, Germany. They took brightness and positional da… [+6430 chars]

articles.title: Solar storm warning: NASA predicts direct Earth hit from 'fast' impact– Where will it hit? - Express
